item.title: Senators closing in on funding federal government less than two days from shutdown
item.description: Democrats are demanding changes to the way federal immigration agents work after the shooting deaths of two U.S. citizens.

item.title: Senate panel passes crypto CFTC regulation bill
item.description: The Senate Agriculture Committee voted Thursday to advance its crypto market structure bill to create CFTC regulatory authority over cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Homan: ICE and CBP crafting 'drawdown plan' in Minnesota, admits 'improvements' needed
item.description: President Donald Trump sent border czar Tom Homan to Minneapolis after federal agents killed a second U.S. citizen in the city.
